CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 3 was then alkylated with 2ethylhexyl bromide in the presence of Cs 2 CO 3 yielding 4,5bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)benzodithiophene ( 4 ) as a sticky colorless liquid.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------- |
| 2ethylhexyl bromide |
| Cs 2 CO 3 |
| 4,5bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)benzodithiophene (4) |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names. The other entities, such as "3", "yielding", "as a sticky colorless liquid", do not refer to specific materials.

The entities "yielding" and "as a" are not material properties and have been removed.
